options.content:
Other Globus Task Statistics
  • This dashboard provides a summary of Task information for science registry tagging, organizations, and countries, as well as volume and counts of Tasks.

  • Globus Task endpoints are de-identified, and private data sources are marked "Private".
  • Private Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.ip_version:4

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.ip_version:6

meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ( meta.src_location.data_source:scireg OR meta.dst_location.data_source:scireg ) AND NOT ( meta.src_location.data_source:scireg AND meta.dst_location.data_source:scireg ) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community)

options.content: Tasks with only one end tagged in Science Registry

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ( meta.src_location.data_source:scireg AND meta.dst_location.data_source:scireg ) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community)

options.content: Tasks with both ends tagged in Science Registry

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)
